00025 #include "drv_glcd.h"

00037 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00043 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00044 #define TIMER0_TICK_PER_SEC   20
00045 
00046 /************************** PUBLIC DEFINITIONS *************************/
00047 extern FontType_t Terminal_6_8_6;
00048 extern FontType_t Terminal_9_12_6;
00049 extern FontType_t Terminal_18_24_12;
00050 
00051 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00052 volatile Bool CntrSel = FALSE;
00053 
00054 /*variable for clitical section entry control*/
00055 uint32_t CriticalSecCntr;
00056 
00057 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00058 /* Interrupt service routine */
00059 void TIMER0_IRQHandler (void);
00060 
00061 void Dly100us(void *arg);
00062 
00063 
00064 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00065 /*********************************************************************/
00070 void TIMER0_IRQHandler (void)
00071 {
00072         //check BUT1
00073         if(!(GPIO_ReadValue(0)&(1<<23)))
00074         {
00075                 CntrSel = FALSE;
00076         }
00077         //Check BUT2
00078         else if (!(GPIO_ReadValue(2)&(1<<13)))
00079         {
00080                 CntrSel = TRUE;
00081         }
00082   // clear interrupt
00083         TIM_ClearIntPending(LPC_TIM0, TIM_MR0_INT);
00084         NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(TIMER0_IRQn);
00085 }
00086 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00087 /*********************************************************************/
00092 void Dly100us(void *arg)
00093 {
00094         volatile uint32_t Dly = (uint32_t)arg, Dly100;
00095         for(;Dly;Dly--)
00096     for(Dly100 = 500; Dly100; Dly100--);
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00100 /*********************************************************************/
00105 int c_entry(void)
00106 {
00107         Bool SelHold;
00108         uint32_t AdcData, timer_tick;
00109         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00110         TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TimerCfg;
00111         TIM_MATCHCFG_Type MatchCfg;
00112 
00113         // But 0,1 init
00114         GPIO_SetDir(0, (1<<23), 0); //Setting BUT0 (P0.23) as input
00115         GPIO_SetDir(2, (1<<13), 0); //Setting BUT1 (P2.13) as input
00116 
00117         /* ADC Pin select
00118          * P1.31 as AD0.5
00119          */
00120         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00121         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00122         PinCfg.Pinmode = 2; //Pin has neither pull-up nor pull-down
00123         PinCfg.Pinnum = 31;
00124         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00125         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00126 
00127         // Enable ADC clock
00128         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAD, ENABLE);
00129 
00130         /* Initialize ADC peripheral */
00131         ADC_Init(LPC_ADC, 100000);
00132 
00133         /* Enable ADC channel 5 */
00134         ADC_ChannelCmd (LPC_ADC, 5, ENABLE);
00135 
00136         /* Start ADC */
00137         ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC, ADC_START_NOW);
00138 
00139         /* Initialize TIMER0
00140          * Timer channel: TIMER0
00141          * Timer mode: every rising PCLK edge
00142          * Prescale option: TICKVAL
00143          * Prescale value = 0
00144          */
00145         TimerCfg.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_TICKVAL;
00146         TimerCfg.PrescaleValue = 0;
00147         TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_COUNTER_RISING_MODE, &TimerCfg);
00148 
00149         //disable timer counter
00150         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0, DISABLE);
00151 
00152         /* Initalize Match MR0
00153          * - Enable interrupt
00154          * - Enable reset
00155          * - Disable stop
00156          * - Match value = CLKPWR_GetPCLK(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER0)/(TIMER0_TICK_PER_SEC)
00157          */
00158         timer_tick = CLKPWR_GetPCLK(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER0)/(TIMER0_TICK_PER_SEC);
00159         MatchCfg.MatchChannel = 0;
00160         MatchCfg.IntOnMatch = ENABLE;
00161         MatchCfg.ResetOnMatch = ENABLE;
00162         MatchCfg.StopOnMatch = DISABLE;
00163         MatchCfg.ExtMatchOutputType = TIM_EXTMATCH_NOTHING;
00164         MatchCfg.MatchValue = timer_tick;
00165         TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM0,&MatchCfg);
00166 
00167         // Clear MR0 interrupt pending
00168         TIM_ClearIntPending(LPC_TIM0, TIM_MR0_INT);
00169 
00170         //Enable TIMER0 interrupt
00171         NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIMER0_IRQn);
00172 
00173         // Enable TIMER0 counter
00174         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0, ENABLE);
00175 
00176         // GLCD init
00177         GLCD_PowerUpInit((unsigned char *)NXP_Logo.pPicStream);
00178         GLCD_Backlight(BACKLIGHT_ON);
00179 
00180         GLCD_SetFont(&Terminal_9_12_6,0x000F00,0x00FF0);
00181         GLCD_SetWindow(10,116,131,131);
00182         GLCD_TextSetPos(0,0);
00183 
00184         if(CntrSel)
00185         {
00186                 SelHold = TRUE;
00187                 GLCD_print("\fContrast adj.\r");
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191                 SelHold = FALSE;
00192                 GLCD_print("\fBacklight adj.\r");
00193         }
00194 
00195         while(1)
00196         {
00197                 AdcData = ADC_GlobalGetData(LPC_ADC);
00198                 if(AdcData & (1UL << 31))
00199                 {
00200                         //AD0 start conversion
00201                         ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC, ADC_START_NOW);
00202                         AdcData >>= 10;
00203                         AdcData  &= 0xFF;
00204                         if(SelHold)
00205                         {
00206                                 // Contract adj
00207                                 GLCD_SendCmd(SETCON,(unsigned char *)&AdcData,0);
00208                         }
00209                         else
00210                         {
00211                                 // Backlight adj
00212                                 AdcData >>= 1;
00213                                 GLCD_Backlight(AdcData);
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216                 if(SelHold != CntrSel)
00217                 {
00218                         SelHold ^= 1;
00219                         if(SelHold)
00220                         {
00221                                 GLCD_print("\fContrast adj.\r");
00222                         }
00223                         else
00224                         {
00225                                 GLCD_print("\fBacklight adj.\r");
00226                         }
00227                 }
00228         }
00229         return 1;
00230 }
00231 
00232 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00233    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00234    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00235    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00236    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00237 int main(void)
00238 {
00239     return c_entry();
00240 }

00247 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number

00249 *******************************************************************************/
00250 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00251 {
00252         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00253          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00254

00256         while(1);
00257 }
